server.addressHint: Server listening address, 0.0.0.0 means listening on all network interfaces
server.portHint: Port number that WebDAV service listens on
server.prefixHint: URL path prefix for WebDAV service, default is root path '/'
server.directoryHint: Root directory for WebDAV server file storage, ensure the directory exists and has read/write permissions
server.tlsHint: Enable HTTPS secure connection, requires valid SSL certificate and private key
server.certHint: Full path to SSL certificate file
server.keyHint: Full path to SSL private key file
server.debugHint: Enable detailed debug log output, helpful for troubleshooting but generates a lot of logs
server.sniffHint: Prevent server from automatically detecting file types, improves security but may affect some clients
server.proxyHint: If the server is behind a reverse proxy (like Nginx), enable this option to correctly get client IP
server.permissionsHint: Default permissions for new users, multiple permissions can be combined (e.g., CRUD means all permissions)

users.usernameHint: User login name, should not contain special characters
users.passwordHint: User login password, recommended to use strong password (16-character combination of uppercase, lowercase letters and numbers)
users.directoryHint: User's exclusive file directory, will be created automatically if it doesn't exist
users.permissionsHint: User's operation permissions, can be combined as needed

logs.title: Log Configuration
logs.formatHint: Log output format, Console format is more readable, JSON format is better for log analysis
logs.colorsHint: Use color highlighting in console output, only effective for Console format
logs.outputsHint: Log output destination, usually choose stderr for integration with system logs

cors.title: CORS Configuration
cors.enableHint: Enable Cross-Origin Resource Sharing, allowing web pages to request resources from different domain servers
cors.credentialsHint: Allow cross-origin requests to carry authentication information (such as Cookies)
cors.headersHint: Allowed HTTP request headers, multiple headers separated by commas (e.g., Depth, Content-Type)
cors.hostsHint: Allowed source addresses, multiple addresses separated by commas (e.g., http://localhost:8080, https://example.com)
cors.methodsHint: Allowed HTTP methods, multiple methods separated by commas (e.g., GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
cors.exposedHeadersHint: Response headers that clients are allowed to access, multiple headers separated by commas

messages.confirmRestart: Are you sure you want to restart the WebDAV server? The service will be temporarily unavailable during restart.
messages.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete user "{username}"? This action cannot be undone.

errors.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to backend service:

validation.permissionsRequired: Please select at least one permission
